text.tspan: You receive at least one loan solicitation or preapproved credit offer each week.
You usually toss preapproved credit or loan solicitations in the trash without shredding.
You usually toss old banking or credit documents in the trash without shredding.
■ Mail is delivered to you in an unlocked mailbox.
■ You send mail by placing it in an unlocked mailbox.
■ You carry your Social Security or Social Insurance card in your wallet.
Identity Theft: Are You At Risk? • Chapter 1
■ Your Social Security Number is printed on the health insurance card in
■ Your Social Security Number is printed on your driver’s license.
■ Your Social Security or driver’s license number is printed on your per-
■ You make purchases online using a credit card.
■ You seldom check whether a site is “secure” before using a credit card to
make an online purchase or before disclosing private data, such as your
Social Security Number, to a Web site.
■ You seldom read Web site privacy policies before disclosing private
■ Your online account with your bank, health insurer, or stockbroker uses
your Social Security Number as your account number.
■ Your bank doesn’t require a password before allowing you to make a
■ The password for your online bank account is written down in an
■ Your ATM PIN is written down in your wallet or on the ATM card.
■ You sometimes share your name, address, e-mail address, and/or phone
■ You don’t use privacy software to remove identifying information from
■ You seldom take advantage of programs designed to opt-out of informa-
■ You haven’t seen your credit report in the past year.
■ Your Internet-connected computer stores private or financial informa-
tion and is not protected from the Internet by both a firewall and
You: Hello, I’m Joe User’s daughter.We just moved my dad to a senior
community, and I need to make sure he changed his gas service over to
his new address. Bless his heart—he doesn’t remember things the way he
used to! Can you tell me the address that’s showing on his account?
Gas Company clerk: I show his address is 555 Shady Lane. Is that the
You:Yes it is; thank you very much. Bye.
More then just ATM, Drivers License, and Credit Cards
■ Other membership cards (health clubs, shopping clubs, and so on)
■ Receipts with credit card numbers on them
■ Checks or deposit slips with bank account numbers
